column2:
df %>% filter(Type=="GPU" & Vendor %in% c("NVIDIA", "AMD") & Release.Year >= 2010) %>% 
  group_by(Vendor, Release.Year) %>% 
  summarise(mean_tdp = mean(TDP..W., na.rm=TRUE)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Release.Year, y=mean_tdp, color=Vendor, group=Vendor)) +
  geom_line()
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'Vendor'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
